reviews.author: Jennifer Craig
reviews.review: I have been a tenant under Integra for over a year and a half now, they have been seamless to work with, respond promptly if I need maintainence, always keep me in the loop on anything happening in my building. After dealing with other

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the kind words!!

reviews.author: Michele M.
reviews.review: Our 55+ community in Bellingham had two previous property management companies before Integra. Our HOA Board was very dissatisfied with those two previous companies; and very satisfied with Integra. As an owner, I have been impressed by

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your kind words.

reviews.author: NJ GP
reviews.review: I have had very good experiences with the Integra office over 3+ years .Have called 3-4 times about issues which were handled effectively, promptly and well. The latest rate of response was-same day-impressive.

reviews.author: OnTheRoadAgain
reviews.review: Yes, yes, yes! Sadie Sullivan, the absolute most unprofessional of the bunch. No clue how to speak to homeowners. Thank you so much to all of the other reviewers who are posting about their negative experiences with this company. I am

reviews.author: Mareyoko Butler
reviews.review: I rented a condo in birch bay through Integra years ago and had the WORST experience I have EVER had with any kind of business of that kind. I always look back on it and laugh at the irony of their name. From my experience they are

reviews.author: Kat DeVaney
reviews.review: We have had multiple interactions with Integra in which they have lost keys, blamed us for it, yelled at us and then told US that we were unprofessional, incorrectly identified who the owners of the property were, and generally have been

ownerResponse.text: It is unfortunate that you lost your keys.  As we tried to explain, we have never had keys to your unit as it was on the master system and we had no need of them.  A key for you was located with the Board of Directors, of which you were  More

reviews.author: Dee Brown
reviews.review:
Awful company. I couldn't agree more with the previous reviewers.

I deal with Integra as a tenant. They have threatened to evict me and have also

reviews.author: Joann Childs
reviews.review: Efficient process ascertaining knowledge regarding my dues.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you.  We are always happy to assist anyway we can.

reviews.author: Ed DeVaney
reviews.review:
In response to Integra's response to Kat DeVaney:
Your response is simply false. It is plain you have no problem being dishonest with your customers. At your company's request, to accommodate fire inspections

reviews.author: Pres Play
reviews.review: I'll preface by saying, based on my recent encounter with Integra I was quite shocked to see all the negative reviews. I can only presume that my positive experience with Integra is perhaps a result of that feedback and reflection on how a

reviews.author: Ms Down to earth
reviews.review: I talked with Tess on the phone because I am in the process of buying a condo under her management. She was rude and seemed to resent answering my questions. Finally she told me she gets paid for answering questions. My mortgage broker

reviews.author: Erin Smith
reviews.review: I couldn't agree more with the other reviews!  This company has the absolute worst customer service I have ever experienced.  They don't seem to understand who the customer is and how they get paid.  They are horribly rude on the phone when

reviews.author: Jesfer Mikesell
reviews.review: worst experience renting through them... dealt with numerous package thefts and car break ins. Never respond or do anything about these types of incidents.

ownerResponse.text: We would be happy to assist you, however you are not listed as a resident at any of our managed properties.

reviews.author: Scott Brown
reviews.review: I am a long term Board Member of an HOA in Blaine Wa. I and our association have been associated with Integra and Tess and Cindy Rae for more than 10 years as our Property Managers. We  have always found them to be very professional, extremely helpful and experts in providing the oversite and planning we require.

reviews.author: Zach Dugan
reviews.review: I have never felt so awful about customer service than I have with this company. In particular one person Sadie Sullivan, the way I was treated by her was incomprehensible. I was simply trying to resolve an issue and she consistently talked down to me and even raised her voice towards me. STAY AWAY

reviews.author: Taf Kama
reviews.review: My experience with Integra has been awful. Their front desk desk staff members are rude and full of excuses. They have no real interest in helping condo owners and instead will look for any opportunity to deflect responsibility away from

reviews.author: caleb young
reviews.review: I don't even want to give them a star!  And after reading their 'mission statement' I wonder what they are supposed to do for us, unless being super disrespectful is one of their tenets. Someone at the company  told us to do something, then

reviews.author: Richard Huizenga
reviews.review: Over the years Integra and I have worked together. All experiences with the staff have been professional, ethical and organized. They are great people and skilled at there services.

reviews.author: Michael Bell
reviews.review: Read the other reviews, they are all 100% on point. How does it reflect on an HOA that every single review of their organization is scathingly negative?

reviews.author: Tim Heredia
reviews.review: I have tried to contact manager several times within the past two years,  left my phone number requesting call back , she has not returned any of my calls , receptionist always states she is out to lunch or in a meeting , called this time due to fire issue , no return call again , not very professional of this management company .

reviews.author: Jenna Ruud
reviews.review: The women here were lovely and helpful. And very cool office, too

ownerResponse.text: Thank you!!  Always happy to help!

reviews.author: Jasmine Munro
reviews.review:
Sorry to say this, but don't do any business with them. Don't trust their websites because it's not true.
The stuffs are rude on the phone/in person. Unprofessional.
My advice is be far away from them.

reviews.author: Samuel Conrad
reviews.review: Have rented from them for 3 years now, easy to deal with.

reviews.author: Tim Adkins
reviews.review: Be very careful before doing any business with this company. Ironically named.

reviews.author: Max Archer
reviews.review: Great management company.

ownerResponse.text: Can you please explain the reason for your displeasure.  We would welcome the opportunity to improve your impression of our company.
